mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM ( SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(C_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') C_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, NVL(PARENTS_COMMENT_NO, 0) AS PARENTS_COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL, MODIFY_YN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_LIKE L WHERE L.COMMENT_NO = C_INNER.COMMENT_NO AND STATUS = 1) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_LIKE L WHERE L.COMMENT_NO = C_INNER.COMMENT_NO AND STATUS = 2) BAD_COUNT, (SELECT NVL(MAX(STATUS), 0) FROM COMMENT_LIKE L WHERE L.COMMENT_NO = C_INNER.COMMENT_NO AND L.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) LIKE_CHECK FROM "COMMENT" C_INNER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ) C START WITH PARENTS_COMMENT_NO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENTS_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE "COMMENT" SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, MODIFY_YN = 'Y' WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}

MERGE INTO COMMENT_LIKE L USING DUAL ON (L.COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo} AND L.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET STATUS = CASE WHEN L.STATUS = #{status} THEN 0 ELSE #{status} END WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (COMMENT_NO, MEMBER_NO, STATUS) VALUES (#{commentNo}, #{memberNo}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_LIKE WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_LIKE WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo} AND STATUS = 2
SELECT NVL(MAX(STATUS), 0) FROM COMMENT_LIKE WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
